dmca.title: Re: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3191816Q] Fwd: copyright
dmca.body:
Dear Sir,
The clip has my name and this email near the end of
it, as I said in my original email. Here is my report
on BBC newsnight, which contains some of the same
material. 

http://news.bbc.co.uk/player/nol/newsid_6270000/newsid_6277200/6277261.stm?bw=bb&mp=rm

Please remove it as soon as possible.

Yours faithfully,


Matthew Bristow

--- Copyright <copyright@theplanet.com> wrote:
